section.title: Sam's Diner
section.para: A huge truck passed by, eating up four whole lanes with its girth. The whole back section was a glitzy passenger compartment trimmed in chrome and neon. The roof sprouted a giant image of a hamburger with flashing lights and the words, "Sam's Scruvi Soul Snax Shac". As it sped past at foolhardy speed, I saw a bevy of cars roped to the back, swerving back and forth.

listitem.para: a stretch limousine about 50 yards long,
and the cutest little pod-cars shaped like spheres, with caterpillar tracks on the bottoms.

section.para: I made to intercept the truck, to hitch up my vehicle and climb aboard.

note.para: If you want to chain up your car to a moving truck, you had better know what you are doing.
